column4: Anyone notice that no matter how much you change the color of gnome-panel the apps on it are still the same default color?
a number of applets do support that
if you have time, it won't take long to fix the rest
you can write patches to fix this, it shouldn't take long
ubuntu is configured to use esd by default
Mine seems to be set up for ALSA
we use the alsa drivers with the oss emulation layer, and esd on top.
I cant get my two programs to share sound, and nevyn said there would be latency if i used a wrapper
you'll be using a wrapper. the latency issue is minor.
i'm not sure how to active this esd wrapper..
